answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Along with antibiotic cover you need to drink plenty of fluids. Holding on to urine, drinking less fluid can also aggravate the infection. Flushing out of bacteria by frequent urination also helps.  I suggest you consult a gastroenterologist and look into the cause of constipation. Most likely it is because you do not eat healthy and drink plenty of fluids. Chronic constipation can be due to diabetes, hypothyroidism, colon disorders, irritable bowel syndrome, diverticular diseases, cancers, severe acidity etc. It can also be due to milk allergy and other food allergies. Hope this helps. Take care!
